Pre-Game Insights: Jos Buttler has slammed the Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association (HPCA) Stadium's outfield, calling it 'poor' and not ideal for any fielding side.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at the Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association (HPCA) Stadium in Dharamsala, which is currently under the scanner for its poor outfield.
The weather will be pleasant, with temperatures expected to hover between 15 and 22 degrees Celsius and 57% humidity.
Others: The match will be played on Tuesday, October 10, 2023, at 10:30am IST, with the toss scheduled at 10am IST.
The match will be broadcast live on the Star Sports Network, and live streamed on the Disney+Hotstar app and website.
